required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Assessment of Pharmacokinetics of a Single Oral Dose of VIMOVO in Healthy Adult Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Open-label, Single-center Study to Assess the Pharmacokinetics of a Single Oral Dose of VIMOVO (250 mg Naproxen/20 mg Esomeprazole)in Healthy Adult Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: This is an assessment of Pharmacokinetics of a single oral dose of VIMOVO in healthy adult volunteers.

detailed_description.textblock: A Phase I, Open-label, Single-center Study to Assess the Pharmacokinetics of a Single Oral Dose of VIMOVO (250 mg Naproxen/20 mg Esomeprazole)in Healthy Adult Subjects

primary_outcome.time_frame: Pharmacokinetic samples will be collected at pre-dose, 10, 20, 30, and 45 minutes post-dose, and 1, 1.5, 2,2.5, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 24, 36, and 48 hours post-dose. The 72 hour post-dose sample will be collected at Visit 3 (Follow-up).

Pharmacokinetic samples will be collected at pre-dose, 10, 20, 30, and 45 minutes post-dose, and 1, 1.5, 2,2.5, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 24, 36, and 48 hours post-dose. The 72 hour post-dose sample will be collected at Visit 3 (Follow-up).

primary_outcome.measure: area under the concentration-time curve from zero to time of last quantifiable concentration (AUC(0-t))
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pharmacokinetic samples will be collected at pre-dose, 10, 20, 30, and 45 minutes post-dose, and 1, 1.5, 2,2.5, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 24, 36, and 48 hours post-dose. The 72 hour post-dose sample will be collected at Visit 3 (Follow-up).

primary_outcome.measure: area under the concentration-time curve from zero to infinity (AUC)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pharmacokinetic samples will be collected at pre-dose, 10, 20, 30, and 45 minutes post-dose, and 1, 1.5, 2,2.5, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 24, 36, and 48 hours post-dose. The 72 hour post-dose sample will be collected at Visit 3 (Follow-up).

primary_outcome.measure: apparent terminal rate constant (Î»z), apparent terminal half-life (t1/2)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pharmacokinetic samples will be collected at pre-dose, 10, 20, 30, and 45 minutes post-dose, and 1, 1.5, 2,2.5, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 24, 36, and 48 hours post-dose. The 72 hour post-dose sample will be collected at Visit 3 (Follow-up).

primary_outcome.measure: apparent systemic clearance after extravascular dosing (CL/F)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pharmacokinetic samples will be collected at pre-dose, 10, 20, 30, and 45 minutes post-dose, and 1, 1.5, 2,2.5, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 24, 36, and 48 hours post-dose. The 72 hour post-dose sample will be collected at Visit 3 (Follow-up).

primary_outcome.measure: apparent volume of distribution following extravascular dosing (Vz/F) for naproxen and esomeprazole
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pharmacokinetic samples will be collected at pre-dose, 10, 20, 30, and 45 minutes post-dose, and 1, 1.5, 2,2.5, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 24, 36, and 48 hours post-dose. The 72 hour post-dose sample will be collected at Visit 3 (Follow-up).

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence and severity of Adverse events during the study as a measure of safety and tolerability
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Collected from administration of VIMOVO (Visit 2 [Residential period] Day 1) until the end of the study, including follow-up

secondary_outcome.measure: Abnormalties in Clinical laboratory tests (hematology, clinical chemistry, and urinalysis) as a measure of safety and tolerability
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Labs will be taken from screening to follow up visit

secondary_outcome.measure: Abnormalities in Vital signs as a measure of safety and tolerability
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From screening to follow up visit

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy male and female subjects aged 18 to 55 years
- Capable of understanding and complying with the Clinical Study Protocol
- Body mass index (BMI) of 19 to 30 kg/m2 and weight of 50 to 100 kg
Exclusion Criteria:
- Previous enrollment in the present study
- Receipt of another investigational product within 4 weeks before this study or plans to participate in another study at the same time as this study
- Female subjects with a positive urine pregnancy test

overall_official.affiliation: Quintiles Phase I Services, Overland Park, Kansas

clinical_study.keyword: Amount of VIMOVO in the blood
